caption: When a lion discovered yoga bliss in a rooftop garden, it turned the sunrise into a personal masterpiece—watching it stretch like a sunrise is a treat 😺. Its serene stretch turned the rooftop into a living canvas, and the morning breeze sang along with its whisker choreography. With a gentle purr as soundtrack, the scene invites you to join the zen vibes and sip on sunrise latte. Who said life was easy? 😹
